data.description:
BUILD YOUR OWN ARCADE PLAYGROUND

Build and customize your own arcade while playing officially licensed arcade games!  Bowl, throw axes, party with friends, and explore other arcades and venues in the city's growing entertainment hub!  


• Customize, clean and design your arcade layout
• Complete tasks to reveal secret areas
• Explore other people’s public arcades

PLAY OFFICIALLY LICENSED GAMES
• Win tickets and redeem prizes
• 10 ticket redemption games
• 18 retro indie arcade games
• Multiplayer up to 4 people

AXE-CITING ATTRACTIONS!
In addition to 6 lanes of ten-pin bowling, explore BATL Axe Throwing, the pioneers of the sport from the real world, now the first official axe throwing experience in VR. Unleash your inner lumberjack and compete with friends across 9 game modes, including a target so large it needs its own zipcode!  You can even unlock 10 larger than life axes to take to BATL!

10 TICKET REDEMPTION ARCADE GAMES
• Balloon Buster
• Chicken Farm
• HYPERpitch
• HYPERshoot
• Let's Bounce
• Mega Color Match
• Mega Spin
• Prize Box
• Speed of Light
• Stacker

18 RETRO INDIE ARCADE GAMES
• Banana Chase
• Birds With Guns
• Deer Santa
• Distant Galaxy
• Dominion Ex
• Dragon's Playground
• Froggy Road
• Golf Sunday
• Harold's Bad Day
• Marble Merger
• Pico Dino
• Polar Panic
• Pony 9000
• RGB Zero
• Scrap Boy
• Stuck in the Sewers
• Sub-Uber-Marine
• Whiplash Taxi Co

More officially licensed games from Bay Tek available as add-ons!

changelog.change_log:
FIXED
- In-game purchase issues - Please try again if you've encountered issues previously while purchasing Add-Ons via the back office Arcade Manager

15 March 2024

Moving games in your arcade after someone else has joined, sometimes may make that game unplayable for that visitor
Prize Box claw movement not being synced in multiplayer
Arcade Galactic retro games sometimes showing the same leaderboard on every cabinet
Retro cabinets clipping into each other when placed next to each other
Can’t load leaderboards after setting a high score
Quik Drop cups stopping rotating when a visitor disconnects
Distant Galaxy sometimes giving extreme amounts of XP

8 March 2024

Improved
- Audio balancing of the ambient music from BATL and Arcade Galactic in the street

Fixed
- Leaving the arcade before placing your second game and going to Arcade Galactic would cause the task for your second task to not be completable
- Changing audio settings on retro games in the arcade triggering errors that caused various bugs

Known Issues
- Moving games in your arcade after someone else has joined, sometimes may make that game unplayable for that visitor

7 March 2024

New
- Arcade Galactic has come to Arcade Legend!
- Added 18 brand new retro indie games!
- Banana Chase
- Birds With Guns
- Deer Santa
- Distant Galaxy
- Dominion Ex
- Dragon's Playground
- Froggy Road
- Golf Sunday
- Harold's Bad Day
- Marble Merger
- Pico Dino
- Polar Panic
- Pony 9000
- RGB Zero
- Scrap Boy
- Stuck in the Sewers
- Sub-Uber Marine
- Whiplash Taxi Co

Improved
- Increased capacity from 450-500!

Fixed
- Instant and blink teleport settings could put you in the wrong position after teleporting
- NPCs playing Axe Master backwards
- Bowling lane reinstation task sometimes not being completable

Known Issue
- Moving games in your arcade after someone else has joined, sometimes may make that game unplayable for that visitor
- In multiplayer, it’s possible that local cabinet leaderboards will be incorrect if you go from your own arcade to Arcade Galactic

23 Feb 2024

Fixed
-Issue where axes in BATL and Axe Master sometimes had 0 gravity / got stuck in the air

Known Issues
-Sometimes the axe in a remote player's hand (ie, a friend in multiplayer) won't move while they're holding it. After being thrown, the axe teleports to the correct position.

15 February 2024

New
-Arcade Collections: Bay Tek Pack 2
--Grand Piano Keys!
--Axe Master!
--Spin-N-Win!
-Leaderboards have been rolled out to more games 
--Chicken Farm
--Quik Drop
--Sink It
--Skee-Ball Modern
--Skee-Ball Glow
--Skee-Ball Classic
--Skee-Ball Ultra

Improved
-Scores will now contribute to leaderboards, whether you’re in your own arcade or someone elses
-When the lighting in the arcade is dimmed, arcade cabinets will also appear dimmer
-Screens around the arcade will activate from further away so players don’t need to get as close to use them

Fixed
-Bowling balls clipping into the surface of the bowling alley
-Jitter when magnetting items into the players hand from far away
-Mega Spin won’t cause noticeable lag spikes, especially when playing in multiplayer

Known Issues
-MCML still has occasional issues in multiplayer, these can often be resolved by the player experiencing the issue leaving the room and rejoining. We will further improve the stability of MCML in future updates.

15 December 2024

Improved
- Performance, especially in multiplayer, has been significantly improved
- UI fades in as players get closer, which helps with performance 

Fixed
- Quik Drop balls sometimes teleport to the front of the arcade in multiplayer
- MCML breaking when another player joins or leaves the arcade
- MCML sometimes getting stuck in the minor prize state in multiplayer
- Uninteractable extra ball being stuck in the Skee-Ball ball chute
- Leaderboard item getting stuck in the floor near the stairs to the bar
- Axe Throwing scoreboard UI overlapping sometimes
- Axe Throwing target board UI overlappting sometimes
- Improved the apperance of a number of decorative materials
- Player skin color palette using incorrect colours

Known issues: 
- Mega Color Match Lite still has occasional issues in multiplayer, these can often be resolved by the player experiencing the issue leaving the room and rejoining. We will further improve the stability of MCML in future updates.

24 November 2023

New
- Use the new custom lighting tab on the power glove to change the colour of the lights and structures all around the arcade, giving your location a whole new look!
- Check out the new graphics settings that take full advantage of the Quest 3's improved processing power

Improved
- The Bullseye Blitz target board only breaks if the axe of the player who owns that session removes the axe from the board
- End game state of Tic Tac Toe and Conn-axe 4 axe throwing game modes now clearly show the winning player
- Mega Color Match colours are brighter and contrast better
- Losing players in Tic Tac Toe and Conn-axe 4 now get some XP rather than 0
- Physics of skee-balls on the skee-ball cabinet ramp
- More trash cans!

Fixed
- The scores in axe throwing games could sometimes keep going outside of the boundaries of the scoreboard
- Axes falling through the BATL floor in some places
- The results board at the end of an axe throwing game overlapping with the results of the previous game
- Games sometimes not being removeable from the loading bay
- Tools cannot be placed back into the power glove
- HYPERshoot colours are not properly synchronised in multiplayer
- Leaderboard item sometimes getting “lost” behind walls

Known issues:
- In multiplayer, Quik Drop balls sometimes teleport to the front of the arcade
- In multiplayer, when someone joins or leaves the arcade while MCML is being played, sometimes it gets stuck as grey and unplayable

22 September 2023

New

-Two new axe throwing game modes - Cricket BATL and Cricket Duel!
-Two new giant axe throwing game modes - Cricket Ultra and Conn-axe 4!
-NPCs hang out in the BATL venue as well as the street
-The opening of the BATL venue is now being celebrated in the street, join the party!

Improved

-Increased capacity from 400 - 450!
-More environmental detail around the BATL venue
-Lighting around the phone in the alley has been improved
-Games in the arcade are brighter and stand out more
-Arcade has more depth and definition on environmental objects
-Lights above axe throwing lanes are now functional, and will indicate whose turn it is, and when the player has stepped across the foul throw line
-Added Rules to the axe throwing game board that explain each mode
-Some axe throwing visual effects have been improved
-Changes to locomotion system:
-Teleporting behaves more consistently
-When sprinting up to objects, you won’t slide and end up “inside” walls / objects

Fixed

-Before it’s reinstated, the bowling alley has visual glitches if head is moved side to side while looking at it
-Mega Color Match Lite sometimes not working correctly in multiplayer
-Got Game(s) task checking off two steps at the same time when the third game is placed
-Skee-ball Ultra button in the bowling alley sometimes being greyed out / uninteractable even after it has been purchased

1 September 2023

Improved
- The move tool highlight effect around objects is now less intrusive
- Objects can now be dropped into the trash can 
- Collision accuracy around the clutch in the axe throwing gallery

Fixed
- Multiplayer axe throwing has had a range of bugs fixed and is overall a more stable experience
- Various fixes for issues when travelling between venues 
- Quik Drop sometimes not working correctly in multiplayer
- Mega Color Match Lite sometimes not working correctly in multiplayer
- The host of a multiplayer game can’t place games back in storage while in multiplayer
- Chesterfield couch having erratic movement when moved with the move tool
- Some axe impact VFX playing at the incorrect orientation

24 August 2023

New
- BATL Axe Throwing has come to Arcade Legend!
- Four axe throwing game modes, plus Ultra BATL, a never before seen super sized axe throwing experience
- 10 premium axes to redeem from the prize store, plus five standard axes available immediately

Improved
- Welcome message and logo updated

Fixed
- Throw a Rainbow task not detecting if you already had two HYPERshoot units in your arcade
- Creators of multiplayer rooms being able to get kicked out of their rooms after leaving and coming back

Known Issues
- The host of a multiplayer game can’t place games back in storage while in multiplayer
- Before it’s reinstated, the bowling alley has visual glitches if head is moved side to side while looking at it
- Sometimes in multiplayer the powerglove tool buttons disappear (can be resolved by leaving multiplayer and returning)

11 August 2023

**Improved**

Public lobbies! 

Browse and join public arcades
Open your arcade publicly to share it with the world
Add ability to mute yourself or other players in your arcade
Add ability to kick players from your arcade

25 July 2023

**Improved**

-Increased capacity of arcade from 350 to 400
-Load times have been drastically improved
-Fewer lag spikes when playing Sink It
-Dynamic Resolution - when there are less objects on screen the game will render at a higher resolution, giving you a sharper image. Previously the game was fixed at the default 1.0x render scale (1436x1584 per eye). Now with Dynamic Resolution the game will render at up to 1.35x render scale (1884x2144 per eye) when possible.

**Fixed**

-Mystery reveals not being completable if the game is quit while the mystery reveal is active on the powerglove
-Skee-ball Modern balls entering the top left 10,000 hole on the cabinet roll back down the playfield and cannot be used to score more points

22 June

**Improved**

-Quik Drop and Big Bass Wheel have floor glows like other games
-Skee-ball physics are more consistent
-Skee-ball Ultra screen shows player name and score for every ball
-Skee-ball balls now reset if they’re outside of the cabinet for too long
-HYPERshoot colours are more vibrant
-Color pickers in the character customiser are now easier to grab and move
-Repositioned token acceptors on all Skee-ball units so the cabinets can be properly aligned next to each other
-Moved bowling score UI slightly so that it’s easier to see when standing in position to bowl
-Behaviour of player torso when hands are moved is more natural
-More robust verification of add-on purchases 
-Player mouths animate when talking
-Tokens have a shine effect so that they’re easier to find
-Save data corruption prevention
-Performance

**Fixed**
-Internet connection restored pop up not disappearing sometimes
-Some games resetting their volume on start up
-Skee-ball balls sometimes getting stuck in the ball chute
-Invisible wall preventing bowling when the players hand was used to physically interact with the bowling UI
-Mystery NPC head occasionally spawning in the floor behind the lobby counter
-Volume changes on Big Bass Wheel not applying immediately
-Skee-ball Ultra granting too much XP
-Placing a bowling ball on top of another bowling ball on the loadout shelf causing one of the balls to disappear
-Skee-ball score sometimes not resetting at the end of a credit when playing in multiplayer
-Mega Color Match Lite sometimes not being playable in multiplayer

8 June 2023

New

*Second officially licensed DLC! (Skee-ball Pack)

Improved
*Increase max amount of Trash Cans from 16 to 18
*Bowling score UI redesign
*Bowling console UI redesign
*Add-on purchase flow improved

Fixed

*Big Bass Wheel lever physics sometimes breaking when grabbed with the left hand
*Various Quik Drop multiplayer issues
*Bowling not paying out XP
*Not being able to interact with the bowling console UI by physically touching buttons
*Bowling balls shooting out the back of the ball return
*Various bowling multiplayer issues
*“Reset height” button not working for visitors in the arcade
*Placing the rocket furniture item near the bar sometimes causes it to sink into the ground
*Black screen when teleporting past / through objects in the arcade
*Quik Drop looping the XP vending VFX if the host left the game while XP was being vended
*ENTER ARCADE button sometimes not being interactable, preventing players from joining open arcades

11 May 2023

New
*First officially licensed DLC (Arcade Collections: Bay Tek Pack 1)

Improved
*HYPERpitch visual effects
*HYPERpitch backboard / target lighting
*Visual effect when clothing or jukebox tracks phase in or out
*XP visual effect polish
*Ticket vending visual effect polish

Fixed
*Not being able to move Balloon Buster upstairs
*Fourth player sometimes failing to join a multiplayer arcade
